title: Alfonso Ribeiro revives Fresh Prince Of Bel Air’s Carlton dance on Strictly
text:
Alfonso Ribeiro channeled Carlton on Strictly (Picture: BBC One)

Alfonso Ribeiro revived a classic scene from the Fresh Prince Of Bel Air on Strictly Come Dancing with Mike Bushell.

The 48-year-old actor, who is temporarily replacing Bruno Tonioli on the judging panel, had Mike and Katya Jones’ dance to Sugarhill Gang’s Jump On It dedicated to him.

But why? If you’ll recall, Alfonso danced to the song as Carlton alongside Will Smith in The Fresh Prince Of Bel Air, when the pair entered a Las Vegas dance competition.

After Mike and Katya’s dance, Alfonso stood up from his judging seat to join Mike on the floor, reviving his moves for a brief moment from the show.

Terms and Conditions: You cannot vote for Alfonso tonight.#Strictly pic.twitter.com/2mTOLJw8m6 — BBC Strictly ✨ (@bbcstrictly) October 19, 2019

Alfonso said: ‘We are not going to talk about the Samba, but what we are going to do…

Advertisement

Advertisement

‘Let’s do it together one time,’ Alfonso added.

The other judges however weren’t quite so bowled over by Mike’s performance, with Shirley Ballas saying: ‘As you can see everyone’s on their feet.

‘As for the Samba, I’ll just leave it at that.’

Strictly Come Dancing continues Sunday on BBC One.

MORE: Strictly Come Dancing pros Johannes Radebe and Graziano Di Prima ‘to perform same-sex duet’
description: Alfonso Ribeiro revived the Carlton dance on Strictly Come Dancing.
